name: Lost in your game. (Pre-Made Jam)
description:
I maked this game in 5 hours.

You can join the jam here.

You're dreaming, you see yourself as the main protagonist of the game you're developing.

The only thing apart from you is some floating weird enemys and a fluffly creature that follows and imitates you.

Theres nothing to do.

WASD to move. Space to jump.

Updates will be coming soon.
